column1: Little Goat Diner////At 10 a.m. on a Saturday our wait was an hour
column2: which is fine. When they finally texted us to get our table the hostess said
column3: "Hope you don't mind eating outside." And that was that. Now
column4: normally I'd be pleased to eat outside
column5: but for some reason it's 60 degrees in Chicago this weekend (and it's July)
column6: and actually I didn't want to eat outside. But since we weren't given a choice
